name: Race Mania (itch) (FUBAR)
description:
We're pleased to present you our game for Projekt Gra - Race Mania!


⏩ Quick intro:
Race Mania is one finger drifting game. Mix of Turn Right and Track Mania.


🎮 Steering:
- tap and hold to turn into specific direction
- release to stop turning


Features:
💥 unlockable cars 🏎️
💥 one finger drifting 🤳🏼
💥 highscores 🥇🥈🥉
💥 portrait orientation  📱
💥 hack protection implemented 🐱‍💻
💥 high monetisation potential 💰💰💰
💥 active pit stop! 🔧

📋 Hyper Casual checklist:
✔️portrait mode
✔️ improved game mechanic that already has worked well
✔️ one finger controls
✔️ easy to learn, hard to master
✔️ <20 seconds to learn how to play
✔️ minimalistic UI
✔️ short open>in-game time
✔️ retention mechanic implemented (fuel depleting and refueling after 1 hour or by watching ad, like hearts in Candy Crush)

💡 Further development ideas:
🍕 unlockable maps
🍕 more cars
🍕 upgrades
🍕 adjustable turn areas
🍕 global highscores

🦸🦸 Team:
😎 Grzegorz Kiernozek (developer, designer)
👾 Piotr Kwiatkowski (developer, graphic designer)
